Authors: C Bijeesh, Manoj Kumar A, K. B. Vrinda, C K Pradeep
Title:
Two new species of Craterellus (Cantharellaceae) from
tropical India
Abstract:
Two remarkable species of Craterellus were collected
multiple times from evergreen tropical forests in Kerala State, India.
The species are described as new based on morphological and molecular
data. Complete morphological descriptions, photographs and comparisons
with similar species are provided. Phylogenetic analyses of nrLSU-rDNA
support the placement and novelty of each species
